heading: HR00626
0: A RESOLUTION STRONGLY URGING PRESIDENT RODRIGO R. DUTERTE TO IMMEDIATELY RELEASE ALL MILITARY AND POLICE PERSONNEL WITH PENDING CASES IN COURT OR WERE CONVICTED IN THE PERFORMANCE OF THEIR MANDATED DUTIES UNDERTAKEN UNDER INTERNAL SECURITY  OPERATIONS (ISO), AS A RECIPROCAL ACTION FOR THE RELEASE OF 20 NDF CONSULTANTS AND THE IMPENDING RELEASE OF MORE CPP-NPA-NDF  PRISONERS AS PART OF THE CONFIDENCE-BUILDING MEASURES OF THE ONGOING GRP-NDF PEACE TALKS
principal-authors: ALEJANO, GARY C.; ACOP, ROMEO M.; BATAOIL, LEOPOLDO N.; ESPINO, AMADO JR. T.; TUPAS, RAUL "BOBOY" C.;
status: Pending with the Committee on PEACE, RECONCILIATION AND UNITY since 2016-12-14
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00626
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION STRONGLY URGING PRESIDENT RODRIGO R. DUTERTE TO IMMEDIATELY RELEASE ALL MILITARY AND POLICE PERSONNEL WITH PENDING CASES IN COURT OR WERE CONVICTED IN THE PERFORMANCE OF THEIR MANDATED DUTIES UNDERTAKEN UNDER INTERNAL SECURITY OPERATIONS (ISO), AS A RECIPROCAL ACTION FOR THE RELEASE OF 20 NDF CONSULTANTS AND THE IMPENDING RELEASE OF MORE CPP-NPA-NDF PRISONERS AS PART OF THE CONFIDENCE-BUILDING MEASURES OF THE ONGOING GRP-NDF PEACE TALKS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C., ACOP, ROMEO M., BATAOIL, LEOPOLDO N., ESPINO, AMADO JR. T., TUPAS, RAUL "BOBOY" C.
DATE FILED : 2016-12-13
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON PEACE, RECONCILIATION AND UNITY ON 2016-12-14
